summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5820 for the improvement of Columbia Drive, from Brandon Street on the east to Columbia Way; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by the installation of a street lighting system; under Ordinance No. 76679, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
